featured.text: The kilt can also be worn with a sporran, which is the Gaelic word for pouch or purse.

definition.zh_def: 蘇格蘭傳統服飾中佩戴在腰部的袋子，通常用於攜帶物品。
definition.en_def: A pouch worn at the front of a kilt, traditionally used to carry small items.
definition.example: He reached into his sporran to grab his wallet.
